title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility      The Park Visitor Center is accessible. The park film, Thunder In the Ozarks, has been captioned for the hearing impaired. The park tour road and most tour stops are accessible. The Elkhorn Tavern and all hiking trails are historic and not fully accessible. Park wayside exhibits meet NPS-ADA standards.  If you have any questions regarding accessibility at Pea Ridge, please contact park staff.
